name: WP PrestaShop
author: Joel Gaujard

sections.description:
Include a PrestaShop ecommerce website to your blog.
Include the header and footer of your ecommerce website on your blog.

You need to install the PrestaShop module for WordPress on your ecommerce website to use this plugin : http://prestashop.joelgaujard.info/product.php?id_product=17

Some functionalities :

  • configure the URL of your PrestaShop ecommerce website
  • creation of 2 widgets to include header and footer
  • specify the size of this 2 iframes

Arbitrary section

You must read this tutorial : http://blog.joelgaujard.info/tutorial/tutorial-prestashop-wordpress
sections.installation:
1. Upload the folder wp-prestashop to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Read this tutorial for more information : http://blog.joelgaujard.info/tutorial/tutorial-prestashop-wordpress
sections.faq:
What I have to put on my PrestaShop website ?

You have to download the module wordpress for PrestaShop created by the same author of this module.
sections.changelog:
1.2.1

  • Stable version ready for first release.
  • Plugin test on 2 ecommerce website : http://www.monsieurgolf.com & http://barbiturik.com/

1.2.0

  • Plugin creation on sourceforge (https://sourceforge.net/projects/pswpmodule/).
